snippet: An Ashland man charged with plotting to fly model planes packed with explosives into the Pentagon and the United States Capitol will plead guilty to two charges.
abstract: Rezwan Ferdaus, man charged with plotting to fly model planes packed with explosives into the Pentagon and the United States Capitol, will plead guilty to charges of attempting to provide material support to terrorists and attempting to damage and destroy federal buildings.
lead_paragraph: An Ashland man charged with plotting to fly model planes packed with explosives into the Pentagon and the United States Capitol will plead guilty to two charges.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Man Will Plead Guilty in Bomb Plot
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Man Will Plead Guilty In Bomb Plot
